title: ******TOP FLR CORNER UNIT__H & HW INC******Close to Rte 2/95
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 72131615', 'Rent: $1,825 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/15/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Rent Includes:: Hot Water, Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Great 1 bedroom 1 bath corner unit located in a apartment building.', 'Second floor unit is all ceramic tile floor.', 'Large living room, bedroom with lots of sunlight and great closet space, large eat in kitchen.', 'Ceramic tile bath with full tub.', 'HEAT & HW INCLUDED~1 car parking~~coin op laundry~~', 'Close to rte 2, rte 128, lots of shops, restaurants.', 'Terms: 12 month lease~1st, last, and half month fee', 'good credit, references a must', 'All newly renovated One bedroom/one bathroom, located on Lexington Street in Waltham located in a multi unit apartment building.', 'Great location within minutes to Rte 2 and close to shops, restaurants and busline!', 'Tile floor throughout unit.', 'All new kitchen with granite counters, microwave, range, and new white cabinets (currently being installed).', 'Good size living room open to kitchen and bedroom.', 'Bath has shower, new sink, vanity.', 'Laundry in building, heat and hw inc. 1 car parking and additional guest parking.', 'First,last and half fee', 'Good credit, employment verification rental history required', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Building', 'Lexington Line off Route 2', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New Countertops', 'newly renovated', 'GMRE is an "Equal Housing Opportunity" Real Estate Agency.', ' It is against the Law of MA to refuse to rent to Families with Children or to otherwise discriminate in housing rentals.']
